p.span: The Barnes Report, a newsletter for dental laboratories and dental professionals, nine issues per year.

img.alt: the Barnes Group a think tank of independently owned dental laboratories

p.span: The Barnes Group is a technical consortium of independently owned dental laboratories throughout North America founded in 1993. We develop strategic working partnerships and relationships between our dental laboratories and their dental clients.

span.style: LINE-HEIGHT: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt
span.data-mce-style: line-height: normal; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; color: #000000; font-size: 10pt;

p.span: The Detroit Dental Sleep Network is an association of dentists in southeast Michigan providing oral appliances to patients for treating obstructive sleep apnea. It is the charter division and headquarters of the DDSN and Affiliates. DDSN Affiliates are members of the DDSN outside of southeastern Michigan.

div.p: Copyright 2008 CFS, Inc. All rights reserved.
